Hi all and Happy Easter,


I liked the ideas in your new papers:
- Evolving=
 the Placement and Density of Neurons in the HyperNEAT Substrate
- Transfer=
 Learning through Indirect Encodng

I was wondering whether you had any tho=
ughts about combining them. More specifically, by allowing hidden nodes ins=
ide the "state-space sandwich" configuration. 

Do you think it makes sense=
 to have hidden nodes between the input and output sheets of neurons?


Tha=
nks,

Vassilis
